title: Phase 5: Goldflow Execution Layer
description: Complete Goldflow execution layer from design doc: Controllers, Verifiers, Metrics, configuration system, and Superpowers integration

title: Phase 4: Integration & Testing
close_reason: All subtasks completed (4.1-4.6). Boomtown module created with mprocs config generator, Camp Boss pane, and dashboard launcher.

title: Task 5.1: Create Goldflow Controllers
description: Implement Goldflow Controllers for flow orchestration: Trail Boss Controller, Shift Boss Controller, Claim Agent Controller. Handle retry logic, parallel control, state machine.

title: Task 5.3: Create Goldflow Metrics System
description: Implement metrics collection for Goldflow: cost tracking, time tracking, success rate, token usage. Store in Ledger for analysis.

title: Task 3.2: Create Delivery Pipeline
description: Define the delivery pipeline with 5 stages: review-gate-1, review-gate-2, pr-creation, ci-gate, delivered
close_reason: Completed: Created src/goldflow/pipelines/delivery.ts with 5-stage delivery pipeline

title: Task 5.4: Create goldflow.yaml Configuration
description: Implement YAML-based configuration for Goldflow: processor settings, verifier gates, controller policies, retry policies, timeouts. Parse and validate configuration.

title: Task 5.8: Create Scout Prospect
description: Implement Scout (Linear-Scout equivalent): fetch Linear issues, GitHub PRs, external data. Acts as Goldflow Source adapter.

comments.author: kent
comments.text: QUESTION: Which auth provider should we integrate?

title: Task 5.5: Integrate Superpowers with Goldflow
description: Map Superpowers skills to Goldflow components: Miner uses executing-plans/TDD, Assayer uses code-review, Surveyor uses brainstorming/writing-plans. Load and invoke skills dynamically.

comments.author: kent
comments.text: ANSWER: Use PostgreSQL for better reliability

title: Task 2.7: Implement CLI Commands
description: Created src/paydirt/cli/ with stake, survey, continue, abandon, prospect commands and updated paydirt.ts

title: Task 5.7: Create Claim Agent Prospect
description: Implement Claim Agent (PM equivalent): autonomous decision-making, dual-write to Caravan + Decision Ledger, event-driven Q&A. Represents Chief Prospector for delegation.

title: Task 5.2: Create Goldflow Verifiers
description: Implement Goldflow Verifiers as quality gates: Assayer Verifier (code review), Canary Verifier (test pass), Smelter Verifier (code quality). Each verifier checks gates before allowing flow to proceed.

title: Camp Boss Journal
description: Strategic command log for Camp Boss. Tracks goals, decisions, and observations across sessions.
design:
